name: short-video-maker
description: Creates short videos for TikTok, Instagram Reels, and YouTube Shorts using the Model Context Protocol (MCP) and a REST API.

scripts.build: rimraf dist && tsc --project tsconfig.build.json && vite build
scripts.prepublishOnly:
npm run build && echo "#!/usr/bin/env node
$(cat dist/index.js)" > dist/index.js && chmod +x dist/index.js
scripts.publish:docker: npm run publish:docker:normal && npm run publish:docker:cuda && npm run publish:docker:tiny
scripts.publish:docker:cuda: docker buildx build --platform linux/amd64 -t gyoridavid/short-video-maker:latest-cuda -t gyoridavid/short-video-maker:${npm_package_version}-cuda -f main-cuda.Dockerfile --push ./
scripts.publish:docker:normal: docker buildx build --platform linux/amd64,linux/arm64 -t gyoridavid/short-video-maker:latest -t gyoridavid/short-video-maker:${npm_package_version} -f main.Dockerfile --push ./
scripts.publish:docker:tiny: docker buildx build --platform linux/amd64,linux/arm64 -t gyoridavid/short-video-maker:latest-tiny -t gyoridavid/short-video-maker:${npm_package_version}-tiny -f main-tiny.Dockerfile --push ./

author: David Gyori
